refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Showdefaults outputs (on standard output) a terse description of the defaults used by the %defaultroute facilities in ipsec_auto8 and ipsec_manual8.
Beware that the exact output format is subject to change.

refsect1.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsect1.para: Normal exit status is 0. If no defaults are available, i.e. the interfaces parameter in config setup is not %defaultroute, produces a message on standard error and exits with status 1.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
refsect1.para: Written for the Linux FreeS/WAN project <http://www.freeswan.org> by Henry Spencer.
